name: Haunted House - BBC Micro / Acorn Electron
name_original: Haunted House - BBC Micro / Acorn Electron
description:
From the Usborne "Write Your Own Adventure Programs" book, here's an enhanced version using my own limited input routine and full (live) inventory display.

Nice 64 "room" text adventure featuring treasure, useful items, ghosts, bats and a vacuum cleaner!

Enjoy!
